release.notes: Recorded May 15-17, 2021 at Glass's home on his piano.

videos.title: Philip Glass - Opening (Official Video)
videos.description:
Philip Glass performs Opening, celebrating his new piano album, Philip Glass Solo, on his 87th Birthday. Filmed in Brooklyn, NY, 2021.

► Listen to Philip Glass Solo: bit.ly/m/pgsolo2024

► Follow Philip Glass:
www.philipglass.com
https://www.instagram.co
